MEMBERSHIP
Annual Golf Membership
Annual golf membership includes unlimited golf course play, access to the grill room, six day advance tee time reservations, charging privileges, unlimited range balls, discounted guest fees, handicap fees, 20% off golf shop merchandise and reciprocal privileges. All cart fees are per person and will be charged at the time of play.
2024 Golf Membership:
Single $5,395
plus cart fees (18-hole cart $23 / 9-hole cart $14)
Resident owned cart (18-hole cart fee $12 / 9-hole cart fee $9)
Family $8,295
plus cart fees (18- hole cart fee $23 / 9-hole cart fee $14)
Resident owned cart (18-hole cart fee $12 / 9-hole cart fee $9)
Golf Range Membership $500
enjoy unlimited range balls at the practice facility
Annual Locker fee $100
Annual Bag Storage fee $100
Children are included in the Membership of the adult plus applicable cart fees; please see rules and regulations.
For more information on golf memberships, please contact Aaron Sustad, PGA Head Golf Professional and Membership Director at: 239.652.0102 or
[email protected]
Transfer Golf Membership to new owners or renters, up to 3 times a year:
$200 for Family Golf Membership
$100 for Single Golf Membership
Annual Social Membership
Annual Social Membership provides priority reservations for club-related events and activities at discounted rates as well as charging privileges. Charging privileges require enrollment in auto-pay with a valid credit card. Social memberships cover all occupants in the home.
Resident Household Dues $500
For more information on social memberships, please contact Carrie Morgan, Food & Beverage Manager at: 239.543.4146 or
[email protected]
Prices are subject to change and do not include tax.

Meet the Staff
Magnolia Landing Staff
General Manager/Broker
Christina Southwick
239.543.4146
[email protected]
Christina joined the Magnolia Landing Team in 2007. She is a second generation Southwest Florida Native. She graduated from Mariner High School in Cape Coral and obtained a Bachelor's degree in Business Supervision and Management from Florida Southwestern. Christina holds a Real Estate Brokers License and owns Magnolia Landing Realty, LLC; she has practiced residential and commercial Real Estate since 2000 and managed an office for five years. She also owned and operated a tax return company for 10 years.
Head Golf Professional
Aaron Sustad, PGA
239.543.4146
[email protected]
Aaron Sustad is a Class A member of the PGA originally from Moorhead, Minnesota. He graduated from the University of North Dakota. After college he started his career in the golf business as an assistant in Northern Minnesota at The Preserve at Grandview Lodge. Aaron worked there for 2 years and spent 3 years as a snowbird, first in Scottsdale, Arizona at Grayhawk Golf Club and the next 2 years at Imperial Golf Club in Naples, Florida. He has had the opportunity to work and gain experience in the resort, public, and private sector of the golf business. In September of 2009, Aaron took over as the Head Golf Professional.
Food & Beverage Manager
Carrie Morgan
239.543.4146
[email protected]
In 2010, Carrie Morgan came to us from Beachview Golf Club on Sanibel Island, where she was the Managing Partner of Beachview Steakhouse and Seafood for the last seven seasons. She attended University of Central Florida and Florida Gulf Coast University majoring in Business Management with an emphasis in Hospitality. Carrie began her hospitality career with Hops Brewery as a corporate trainer and unit accountant and also worked at Hard Rock Café International. After relocating to Sanibel Island she helped to reopen the restaurant at Beachview Golf Club as a fine dining steakhouse. Carrie is exceedingly knowledgeable about the food and beverage side of country clubs.

Event Gallery
Event Information
Event Inquiry
Container
The Perfect Setting for Your Next Event
Whether you're planning a golf tournament, wedding venue, holiday party, class reunion, anniversary, get-together or birthday celebration, Magnolia Landing Golf & Country Club can provide you with a spectacular setting for your event. Click
here
to check out our event video.
In our charming clubhouse, we have room for groups ranging in capacity from 10 people to 110 or more if we combine our restaurant with the outdoor patio space. This is a beautiful venue for weddings or parties with wonderful views of the surrounding fairways and lakes.
You can have a formal affair or a more casual get-together. Think about combining your party with a day of golf on our Championship course.
We offer one-on-one attention to all our guests. We're known for it, in fact, that's why groups keep coming back to Magnolia Landing Golf & Country Club year after year. Choose Event Information under the Events tab for additional details and to explore the possibilities.

Event Gallery
Event Information
Event Inquiry
Weddings, Events and Outings
The perfect venue for weddings, holiday parties, business meetings and everything in between. The Clubhouse provides exceptional views and can accomadate up to 110 people. Our championship golf course is perfect for onsite ceremonies and gorgeous photos. If you have questions or are interested in booking an event, please complete the Event Inquiry Form located under the Events tab and a representative will promptly respond.
Events
Weddings
Let Magnolia Landing create lasting memories of your wedding day with a romantic setting, classic elegance and breath-taking views. The beauty of our golf course setting combined with fine dining and top-notch service will provide you with everything you need to make your wedding a dream come true.
The best is yet to be – call today to discuss your special day with us and see how we can make it a day you will always remember!
Private Events
Magnolia Landing Golf & Country Club offers an elegant setting for a variety of social and business affairs. We can accommodate a wide variety of occasions. From casual luncheons and business meetings to formal dinners and grand celebrations, with many options in between, Magnolia Landing will facilitate your needs.
Our professional staff has hosted thousands of events of every type. Their goal is to make your event perfect by listening to your needs and combining their experience with our breathtaking facility to produce the day of your dreams. Just a sample of the events we have hosted for members and non-members:
Weddings
​Baby Showers
Networking Meetings
Graduations
Corporate Meetings
School Events
Seminars
Award Ceremonies
Luncheons
Business Conferences
Golf Tournaments
Bridal Showers
Retirement Parties
Anniversary Parties
Book Clubs
Post-Funereal Reception
Golf Outings and Tournaments
Magnolia Landing Golf & Country Club is the ideal location for your golf event. Whether you are planning a business outing, fundraiser, or social gathering, our highly conditioned and maintained Championship Course, coupled with our beautiful clubhouse, create the perfect setting.
Our course and facilities are well suited for medium and small groups alike, and our professional staff will work with you to create an event plan that suits your needs. We require a minimum of 60 players to host a shotgun start. Smaller events will be accommodated using a modified shotgun start or consecutive tee times. Your group will also have access to our practice facility, which is comprised of a 400 yard aqua range, short game area with bunker and putting greens.
Beyond golf, most groups we host enjoy one or more meals as part of their outing. We offer a range of menu choices for breakfast, casual lunches at the turn, and served dinners.
Let us work with you to design an event that will meet the specific goals and objectives of your organization. Whether you're planning a casual day out for your business colleagues or an annual fundraiser, Magnolia Landing's golf and event professionals have the experience, ability and resources to make your event a success.
Contact us by filling out the an inquiry form or call (239) 652-0102 to inquire about an available date, arrange a time to see our facilities, or for more information on our event services.
